nodes.title: Protecting Beacon and Anvil use by default and protecting Hanging entities from explosions
Allow users to build/destroy in safezone if they can build in a worldguard region.
Switched some more PlayerChatEvent to AsyncPlayerChatEvent for 1.3.1.
Fixes an ender pearl clipping exploit with blocks that occupy less than 1 block in width or length
Deleted empty lines when executing /f show
Fixes for compiler warnings & minor .gitignore enhancement
Actually make it check to see if the player changed their block location...
Fix potions throwing in areas were u cant place blocks?
Power regeneration rate increase as power decreases
Added chat spy feature for admins
Added the possibility to set different amounts of power loss for PvP & PvE deaths
Added a faction power cap based on current land ownership
Fixes all users showing up as 'you' in faction chat.
Added new conf.json setting : bankCanBeUsedEverywhere (default: true)
Added f info command for a quick lookup of players and factions.
Add an option to disable faction only chat
Small typo in Readme (/f help 1 was there 2 times)
Allow Factions to defend their territory from Factionless PVP protected players
Change faction stuff manually on disk
Added pagination and sorting to faction list
Updates for latest CraftBukkit, handle a few logged errors
#1254: Fix land not protected by explosions
Fix econLandRewardRoutine skipping if they have land
Fix NPE caused by lazy cleanup
Bug Fix: Players emptying buckets without perms
added coleader and rank commands, removed unnessessary text
Added coleader, missing rank commands, removed unnessessary text
Fix herochat integration not loading fixes #1043
Correct click-to-accept faction relation change. Fixes #1048
Change the Factions cauldron non-support message
Check for zero money on faction disband
Add an event for when a faction's perms change.
CmdRank changed to allow faction change.
Add missing dependencies and improve lwc dependency
Add missing dependencies and improve lwc dependency
Improving on LWC Integration: Checks all blocks in chunk, checks existin...
Simple Cannons integration and LWC Improvements
Actually supporting custom ban messages now.
Fix EventChunkChange.getUSender() returning null after a server reload
Add tpyes and etpyes aliases for accepting a tpa
Fix behavior of ChatFormatter.unregisterTag() and unregisterModifier()
Allied territory cmddeny; AsyncChatEvent performance improvement
Corrected issue with players joining a faction as the wrong rank.
Make worlguardbuildpriority affect all land, not just safezone.
Added more Spout label alignment options
Implemented NoBoom - Offline Faction Explosion Protection.
Implemented NoBoom - Offline Faction Explosion Protection.
Handle EconomyResponse objects from Vault on all transactions.
Closed a possible resource leak, updated README.md to point to DBO instead of Github's deprecated downloads section
Added a new Factions event for power loss
Make radius first option on claim command
Enemy territory can only be claimed at the corners.  No more bee lines straight to bases.
How about we declare async commands as async
